description: codereview: don't check default paths when codereview disabled

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

http://codereview.appspot.com/5622043/diff/1/lib/codereview/codereview.py
File lib/codereview/codereview.py (right):

http://codereview.appspot.com/5622043/diff/1/lib/codereview/codereview.py#newcode2222
lib/codereview/codereview.py:2222: 
Please move the lines all the way down here.
The usual way to disable code review is to
not have a codereview.cfg.

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=7b05b761af6c ***
